file_content.text: The turbolift's locked down, but don't worry. Slicing Imperial security codes is a hobby of mine. Give me two secs....
Uh oh... someone's coming down the turbolift. Get behind me, beautiful. I'll protect you!
Uh oh... someone's coming down the turbolift. Get ready for a fight!
Doc! I thought the Imps had killed you!
You too, Remmy! How are you making out, old fella?
Same as always. Pretend to cooperate with the Imperials... and stab 'em in the back every chance I get.
We're here to defeat the Empire. Can you get us into the upper levels?
We need your help.
That's a dangerous way to live. Why haven't the Imperials killed you?
How have you survived?
Great thing about Imperials--they're always fighting over promotions. I pin the blame on rivals. They never suspect a thing.
The Empire's about to lose Balmorra. Start stabbing.
A wise policy.
Don't have to tell me twice.
We're in a bind, pal. You know any way into the secure labs?
Sure! The Imps put me on waste management. Gave me a data card to get in there. It's all yours.
Thing is, there's guards every two meters in there.
That's why I travel with a Jedi, Remmy.
Sorry to cut this reunion short. We have a long fight ahead.
Let's go, Doc.
And I finally have a way out of this place. See you on the other side, Doc!
Aren't you afraid the Imperials will blame you for this?
Will you be safe, Remmy?
I have no plans to find out. Not after you opened me a nice sweet path to freedom. Good luck!
You're a meat shield, Doc. Nothing more.
Stop pretending we're friends.
She's crazy about me. Now get out of here, old man.
"Meat shield" is my code name. You'd better run for it, Remmy. We're about to make some noise.
Hello, are you there? It's Colonel Finley. We have a new problem.
The resistance has learned of Imperial research into weapons that use cloaking device technology.
If the enemy can hide their missiles and bombs from detection, imagine the carnage.
The Empire would rip us apart.
We'd be defenseless.
Have they successfully tested such a weapon, or is it just speculation?
Is this threat real?
What difference does it make? We still need to look into it.
Right now, I'm thinking of what we could do to the Empire's forces with that technology.
Let's imagine hurting them.
It could turn the tide of this war.
You must recover all the Empire's research data on this project and deliver it to us.
There's bound to be a computer hub up there somewhere.
This may be our only opportunity. Do everything you can. Finley out....
Aren't you something. All kinds of new faces here today....
